title: Reading the Bible in Translation - the differences between Judaism, Christianity and Islam
description:
#genesis #hebrew #language #kjv

This video is a response to Jacob Faturechi’s video “Your Christian Bible is Lying to you”

Available here - https://youtu.be/uuy5ORSqWxk

Which was a response to my question about the necessity of learning the original languages in the bridges of meaning Q&A

That video is found here https://youtu.be/oLeUYGXzKD8 and my question is found around the 24 minute mark
